title: Clifford statistics and the temperature limit in the theory of fractional quantum Hall effect
abstract: Using the recently discovered Clifford statistics we propose a simple model for the grand canonical ensemble of the carriers in the theory of fractional quantum Hall effect. The model leads to a temperature limit associated with the permutational degrees of freedom of such an ensemble. We also relate Schur's theory of projective representations of the permutation groups to physics, and remark on possible extensions of the second quantization procedure.
